name: stocktradingsimulator
description: A web-based stock trading simulator designed for educational and onboarding purposes. Users start from a selected historical date, analyze real historical market data and news, make trading decisions, and track their virtual portfolio over time.

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd src/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.postinstall: cd src/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
